item.title: Everything We Learned About Diablo from BlizzConline 2021
item.description: Diablo has re-emerged as the sinister gothic capstone of BlizzConline 2021!

item.title: Diablo 3 Patch 2.7.0 Preview: Follower System Revamp
item.description: Patch 2.7.0 will be deployed on the PTR on February 25.

item.title: Anunciado el juego de mesa de Stardew Valley
item.description: Un juego cooperativo para 1-4 jugadores que, por ahora, solo se vende en EE UU.
